name: Axle
headline: Universal API for insurance
description: Axle is Plaid for insurance¬†- a universal API for insurance data. With Axle, companies can instantly verify insurance and monitor ongoing coverage, helping them reduce operational cost while creating a frictionless experience for users. Axle is backed by leading investors including Y Combinator and Gradient Ventures, Google's AI-focused venture fund, and angels from industry leaders like Plaid and Cox Automotive.
tags: industry:developer-tools; industry:fintech; industry:b2b; industry:api; industry:insurance; location:new-york

founders.name: Cameron Duncan, Co-Founder & CEO
founders.description: I‚Äôm passionate about solving problems at the intersection of business, technology, and design. Previously, I led a product team at Clutch (acquired by Cox Automotive) that enabled brands like Porsche deliver new ways to access and own vehicles.

founders.name: Nihar Parikh, Founder
founders.description: I build tools to help developers abstract complex problems and focus on providing great experiences for their customers. Previously, I led product at a seed-stage devtools company and founded Emory‚Äôs first startup accelerator.

# Instantly Verify Insurance.
Automate insurance verification with Axle‚Äôs universal API for insurance.
[üèÅ TSD and Axle partner to deliver Instant Insurance Verification](https://axle.insure/<https:/www.axle.insure/post/tsd-and-axle-partner-to-deliver-instant-insurance-verification-streamlining-operations-and-reducing-risk-for-dealerships-and-car-rental-companies>)[Get started](https://axle.insure/</contact>)
Trusted by leaders in mobility, lending and beyond
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6691166be1d0b1dd6f950531/6751d26a29694f8523548ba0_avis.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6691166be1d0b1dd6f950531/6751d32b5ec678cb0b9a821f_hertz.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6691166be1d0b1dd6f950531/6751d360bc9d2eae7345e8cb_carputty.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6691166be1d0b1dd6f950531/6751d33c135db847d0b0e9df_getaround.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6691166be1d0b1dd6f950531/6751d369a241f8a7664ede57_turo.svg)
## We make access to insurance data s
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668ce3923b95cde16ac48d7a/6762e340d7c372c6ce9f1306_Img_wrapper.png)**Retrieve data directly from the carrier.** Instant access to policy status, term, coverages, and more straight from the source.Explore Verification](https://axle.insure/<https:/axle.insure/product/verification>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668ce3923b95cde16ac48d7a/6762e34020010350957f1f1d_Img_wrapper-1.png)**Receive policy alerts.** Real-time updates when things change including cancellations, updates, and more.Explore Monitoring](https://axle.insure/<https:/axle.insure/product/monitoring>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668ce3923b95cde16ac48d7a/6762e33fe32e2be8ac089b33_Img_wrapper-2.png)**Process any document.** Classify and extract policy information from any ID Card or Declarations page.Explore Document AI](https://axle.insure/<https:/axle.insure/product/document-ai>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668ce3923b95cde16ac48d7a/6762e3400bfe66868b5ede97_Img_wrapper-3.png)**Simplify decisioning.** Automatically validate whether a policy or document meets your requirements, enhanced with AI insights.Explore the Validation Engine](https://axle.insure/<https:/axle.insure/product/validation-engine>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6691166be1d0b1dd6f950531/6752357c4ef7add6423edf7e_jlr.svg)
In the three months prior to using the solution, my service loaner department was exposed to over $20,000 in repairing damages due to customers not having either valid insurance coverage or a policy with adequate coverage. Since implementing the Axle integration, we have brought that down to $0.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6691166be1d0b1dd6f950531/674d4e0acd9a9c2b42ab3a48_eldric-brown.png)
Eldric Brown, Fixed Operations Director at JLR North Atlanta
## We understand your needs deeply.
[Rental Car ](https://axle.insure/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Loaner / Courtesy Car](https://axle.insure/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Dealership Sales](https://axle.insure/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[Insurance Tracking](https://axle.insure/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)[Mortgage Origination](https://axle.insure/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-4>)[Other](https://axle.insure/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-5>)
[Rental CarPrevent an industry average $82K unrecovered loss per year by instantly verifying insurance prior to rental.Learn more](https://axle.insure/</solutions/rental-car>)
[Loaner / Courtesy CarPrevent an industry average $62 unrecovered loss per vehicle per month by instantly verifying insurance for your loaner fleet.Learn more](https://axle.insure/</solutions/loaner-courtesy-car>)
[Dealership SalesReduce your liability and ensure deals are funded quickly by instantly verifying if customer insurance meets lender and state requirements.Learn more](https://axle.insure/</solutions/dealership-sales>)
[Insurance TrackingNext generation insurance tracking that will decrease your cost and increase premiums written while staying more compliant than everLearn more](https://axle.insure/</solutions/insurance-tracking>)
[Mortgage OriginationDrive operational efficiency and ensure a seamless customer experience by instantly validating that borrower policies meet your requirements.Learn more](https://axle.insure/</solutions/mortgage-origination>)
Helping companies of all shapes and sizes
We've partnered with hundreds of companies across automotive, home, renters and beyond to transform their industry and we'd love to hear what you're building and how we can help you achieve your goals.
[Let's talk](https://axle.insure/</contact>)

## Connect to your users‚Äô insurance data in seconds.
Step 01
Ask users to share their insurance
Launch our embeddable consent interface - Axle Ignition - from within your app via API, through one of our platform integrations, or via our Dashboard.
Axle API
[Learn more](https://axle.insure/<https:/axle.insure/product/api>)
Platform integration
[Learn more](https://axle.insure/<https:/axle.insure/product/axle-for-platforms>)
Axle Dashboard
[Learn more](https://axle.insure/<https:/axle.insure/product/dashboard>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668ce3923b95cde16ac48d7a/674db94506d0ff231147b75d_Clay.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668ce3923b95cde16ac48d7a/674e5920527892bcf8237b27_start_ignition.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668ce3923b95cde16ac48d7a/674c564cbc8863cb7e9ba960_Card_login.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668ce3923b95cde16ac48d7a/67473ed2bae7c9d7968812a6_avis-basham-collections-letter.png)
Step 02
**Connect account or upload proof of insurance**
Users connect their insurance account by entering their login information - just like they would with their carrier.As an alternative, users who are unable to login can upload an insurance card or declarations page to be processed by Axle's Document AI.
Login with their carrier
[Learn more](https://axle.insure/<https:/axle.insure/product/verification>)
Upload a document
[Learn more](https://axle.insure/<https:/axle.insure/product/document-ai>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668ce3923b95cde16ac48d7a/674c5cb46541130c2b8b6af1_Clay-1.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668ce3923b95cde16ac48d7a/674c5b30b14bdea270a88ee6_Clay.svg)
Step 03
**Retrieve policy information**
Retrieve policy information via API, from within your existing platform, or view it from our Dashboard.
Axle API
[Learn more](https://axle.insure/<https:/axle.insure/product/api>)
Platform integration
[Learn more](https://axle.insure/<https:/axle.insure/product/axle-for-platforms>)
Dashboard
[Learn more](https://axle.insure/<https:/axle.insure/product/dashboard>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668ce3923b95cde16ac48d7a/674c5e2327cf4082095f1d3f_Clay.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668ce3923b95cde16ac48d7a/674e5b45782cbe6598f5ee02_get_policy.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668ce3923b95cde16ac48d7a/674c5e22247ce92ee23cf08e_Card_login-1.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668ce3923b95cde16ac48d7a/674c5e23714fc3b7bc1eefee_Card_login.svg)
Step 04
**Receive updates when policies change**
Real-time notifications via Slack, email, or webhook when policies change and use Axle's Validation Engine to check if a policy meets your requirements.
[Explore monitoring](https://axle.insure/<https:/axle.insure/product/monitoring>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668ce3923b95cde16ac48d7a/674ede11e322adc216bef177_Webhook.svg)

Enterprise
At Axle, we offer tailored insurance verification solutions that integrate seamlessly with enterprise-level systems. Upholding the highest standards of data security and privacy, we provide dedicated support and scalable services designed to meet the complex needs of large organizations. Partner with us for a commitment to security, privacy, and unwavering support.
  * 25% of the top 30 mortgage servicers
  * 50% of the rental car industry

[Get started](https://axle.insure/</contact>)

# Instantly Verify Insurance.
Automate insurance verification with Axle‚Äôs universal API for insurance.
üèÅ TSD and Axle partner to deliver Instant Insurance Verification‚ü®39‚ü©Get started‚ü®38‚ü©
Trusted by leaders in mobility, lending and beyond
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6691166be1d0b1dd6f950531/6751d26a29694f8523548ba0_avis.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6691166be1d0b1dd6f950531/6751d32b5ec678cb0b9a821f_hertz.svg)

## We make access to insurance data s
![‚ü®40‚ü©**Retrieve data directly from the carrier.** Instant access to policy status, term, coverages, and more straight from the source.Explore Verification](https://axle.insure/<https:/axle.insure/product/verification>)![‚ü®41‚ü©**Receive policy alerts.** Real-time updates when things change including cancellations, updates, and more.Explore Monitoring](https://axle.insure/<https:/axle.insure/product/monitoring>)![‚ü®42‚ü©**Process any document.** Classify and extract policy information from any ID Card or Declarations page.Explore Document AI](https://axle.insure/<https:/axle.insure/product/document-ai>)![‚ü®43‚ü©**Simplify decisioning.** Automatically validate whether a policy or document meets your requirements, enhanced with AI insights.Explore the Validation Engine](https://axle.insure/<https:/axle.insure/product/validation-engine>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6691166be1d0b1dd6f950531/6752357c4ef7add6423edf7e_jlr.svg)
In the three months prior to using the solution, my service loaner department was exposed to over $20,000 in repairing damages due to customers not having either valid insurance coverage or a policy with adequate coverage. Since implementing the Axle integration, we have brought that down to $0.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6691166be1d0b1dd6f950531/674d4e0acd9a9c2b42ab3a48_eldric-brown.png)
Eldric Brown, Fixed Operations Director at JLR North Atlanta

## Connect to your users‚Äô insurance data in seconds.
Step 01
Ask users to share their insurance
Launch our embeddable consent interface - Axle Ignition - from within your app via API, through one of our platform integrations, or via our Dashboard.
Axle API

**Connect account or upload proof of insurance**
Users connect their insurance account by entering their login information - just like they would with their carrier.As an alternative, users who are unable to login can upload an insurance card or declarations page to be processed by Axle's Document AI.

Upholding the highest standards of data security and privacy, we provide dedicated support and scalable services designed to meet the complex needs of large organizations. Partner with us for a commitment to security, privacy, and unwavering support.

generated_description:
**Axle: The Plaid for Insurance**

Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S22, Axle is carving out a unique niche as a universal API for insurance data‚Äîthink of it as Plaid, but for the insurance industry. Based in New York, this ten-member startup aims to simplify the burdensome task of insurance verification and monitoring, creating a frictionless experience for users while also slashing operational costs for businesses.

### Mission and Proposition
Axle's mission is straightforward: to democratize access to insurance data through a universal API. By allowing companies to instantly verify insurance coverage and keep tabs on ongoing policies, Axle empowers organizations to avoid costly lapses and improve compliance. Their approach not only reduces risks but also cultivates a seamless user experience.

### Backing and Support
With backing from notable investors like Y Combinator and Gradient Ventures‚ÄîGoogle's venture arm focused on AI‚Äîand industry heavyweights such as Plaid and Cox Automotive, Axle is well-positioned for growth and innovation.

### Key Capabilities
Axle offers a suite of capabilities designed to streamline insurance processes:
- **Verification**: Instant access to insurance data directly from carriers.
- **Policy Monitoring**: Real-time alerts for any changes to insurance policies.
- **Document AI**: Extracts data from any insurance document effortlessly.
- **Validation Engine**: Enhances decision-making by assessing whether policies meet specific requirements.

### Interfaces and Solutions
The system is accessible through multiple interfaces, including:
- **Axle Ignition**: A user-friendly consent interface for collecting and verifying data.
- **API**: Direct integration of insurance data into existing applications.
- **Dashboard**: For those seeking a straightforward setup without deep integration.

Axle also tailors its solutions to specific industries, offering targeted services for:
- **Rental Cars**: Verifying insurance for rental customers to mitigate losses.
- **Dealership Sales**: Ensuring customer insurance meets lender and state requirements.
- **Mortgage Origination**: Validating insurance policies ahead of closing deals.

### Community and Growth
Axle is already building partnerships with a diverse range of businesses in mobility, lending, and beyond, aiming to reshape the insurance landscape. They‚Äôve noted that they've been able to eliminate over $20,000 in potential damages due to improper coverage with their integration‚Äîdemonstrating the real-world impact of their API.

### The Road Ahead
With a focus on user experience and operational efficiency, Axle is not just another tech startup; it's a significant player aiming to revolutionize how insurance data is accessed and managed. If you‚Äôre an organization dealing with insurance in any capacity, getting familiar with what Axle has to offer could streamline your operations and elevate your customer experience.

For more details, visit [Axle's website](https://axle.insure).
